mapper.select: SELECT mr.`status`,mr.`type`,ccd.`name` as ccdname,ccd.`phone` as ccdphone,ccd.`number` as ccdnumber,cca.`carNumber` as ccaCarNumber,mr.`number`,mr.`tname`, mr.`pickDate`,mr.`overWorkDate`,mr.`completeDate`,mr.`settleDate`,mr.`price`,mr.`getMan`,cca.`id` as ccaid FROM ( SELECT mrp.`number`,mrp.`carInfoId`,mrp.`type`,mrp.`getMan`,mrp.`pickDate`,mrp.`price`,mrp.`completeDate`,mrp.`settleDate`,mrp.`status`,mrp.`overWorkDate`,'维修单' AS tname FROM `maintain_repair` AS mrp UNION ALL SELECT mrs.`number`,mrs.`carInfoId`,mrs.`type`,mrs.`getMan`,mrs.`pickDate`,mrs.`price`,mrs.`completeDate`,mrs.`settleDate`,mrs.`status`,mrs.`overTime`,'救援单' AS tname FROM `maintain_rescue` AS mrs ) AS mr STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_carinfo` AS cca ON mr.`carInfoId` = cca.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS ccd ON cca.`clientId` = ccd.`number`

SELECT mr.`number` ,mr.`pickDate` ,mr.`type`,mr.`completeDate`, cca.`carNumber` as ccaCarNumber ,ccd.`name` as ccdname,ccd.`phone` as ccdphone,ccd.`number` as ccdnumber ,mr.`settleDate`,cca.`id` as ccaid FROM ( SELECT mrp.`number`,mrp.`carInfoId`,mrp.`type`,mrp.`pickDate`,mrp.`completeDate`,mrp.`settleDate` FROM `maintain_repair` AS mrp UNION ALL SELECT mrs.`number`,mrs.`carInfoId`,mrs.`type`,mrs.`pickDate`,mrs.`completeDate`,mrs.`settleDate` FROM `maintain_rescue` AS mrs ) AS mr STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_carinfo` AS cca ON mr.`carInfoId` = cca.`id` STRAIGHT_JOIN `client_clientdata` AS ccd ON cca.`clientId` = ccd.`number` WHERE cca.`carNumber` = #{carnumber}
SELECT number,price FROM ( SELECT mrp.`number`,mrp.`price` FROM `maintain_repair` AS mrp UNION ALL SELECT mrs.`number`,mrs.`price` FROM `maintain_rescue` AS mrs ) AS mr WHERE number = #{number}
mapper.sql: number, carInfoId, counselorId, oil, type, workTime, getMan, overWorkDate, setter, company, beforedate, price, remark, state, teamId, status, completeDate, settleDate, pickDate, default1, default2
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from maintain_repair
order by ${orderByClause}
